title: Tony Hunt: Kwakiutl artist
creator_credit: B T Film-Sound, North American Indian Films and Geoff Voyce
brief_description: Tony Hunt, a Kwakiutl Indian, is the grandson of the legendary Chief Mungo Martin. Since his initial tutoring by his grandfather, Tony has become an artist of international recognition capable of working in many art forms. In this film he makes a beautiful silver spoon.
creator_credit_for_label: B T Film-Sound, North American Indian Films and Geoff Voyce
